title: AI-Integrated Systems & Projects
description: Continuing to build sophisticated AI-integrated systems and projects, focusing on intelligent coding agents, agentic AI tools, and real-world applications that solve complex business problems across various domains including energy, logistics, and data analytics.

title: Cloud-Native & DevOps Mastery
description: Expanding expertise in Kubernetes, Docker, and comprehensive DevOps/MLOps practices through hands-on projects. Building robust, scalable infrastructure for ML model deployment, monitoring, and orchestration using modern cloud-native technologies and automation tools.

title: Open Source Contributions
description: Actively contributing to open-source projects in the AI/ML and infrastructure space, sharing knowledge through code contributions, documentation, and community engagement to give back to the developer ecosystem that has supported my growth.

title: Industry Impact & Innovation
description: Leveraging my open-source mindset, hands-on engineering background, and passion for AI/ML infrastructure to drive innovation, optimize large-scale data systems, and create solutions that make a meaningful impact in the intersection of AI and real-world applications.
